en-UK.name: Beilu Toggle
en-UK.description: AI-controlled dynamic toggling of world book and preset entries.
en-UK.description_markdown: **Beilu Toggle** allows the AI to dynamically enable/disable world book entries and preset prompt entries via `<toggle>` XML tags in its replies.
